name: Scunthorpe Scavenger
description:
Note: Downloading is suggested for performance, but not required.

When exploding wasps and the struggling economy of the United Kingdom are involved, life as a farmer is not as easy as it seems...

Manage, monetize and defend your farm in this top-down simulation of the rural hellscape of Scunthorpe. Collect resources using your tools to upgrade your weapons, walk speed, and windmill, and decide whether to sell your raw goods or process them first!

Controls: WASD/IJKL/Arrow Keys: Move Shift/H: Sprint E/O/Space: Interact Escape: Pause

"Devlog"

Mini Tutorial!

Authors: Gale - Programming, Music & SFX, Art Fire - Art, Concepts

This game is an entry to the Miz Jam 1, using a fixed art kit. It may not be polished, or even finished, but we had fun making it.
